source.name: Survey of Patients’ Hospital Experiences (HCAHPS)
source.description: A list of hospital ratings for the Hospital Consumer Assessment of Healthcare Providers and Systems (HCAHPS). HCAHPS is a national, standardized survey of hospital patients about their experiences during a recent inpatient hospital stay.

datasets.name: Survey of Patients’ Hospital Experiences (HCAHPS)
datasets.description: A list of hospital ratings for the Hospital Consumer Assessment of Healthcare Providers and Systems (HCAHPS). HCAHPS is a national, standardized survey of hospital patients about their experiences during a recent inpatient hospital stay.
